entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers or thunderstorms. Temperature rising to 12 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Showers ending before morning then clearing. A few thunderstorms early this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early this evening. Temperature rising to 12 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 3:34 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
